description: a(n) enumerates integers of binary order n (i.e. those between 2^(n-1) and 2^n, see A029837) which have number of divisors a power of 2.
comments: Increase is exponential with factor near 2.
example: In binary order zone g[ x ]=5 the following 11 numbers have number of divisors which are powers of 2:17,19,21,22,23,24,26,27,29,30,31 with 2,2,4,4,2,8,4,4,2,8,2 divisors resp.
author: _Labos Elemer_
